message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1450000. I believe this price is fair, considering the product's value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1300000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $1300000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1375000. This still leaves room for you to profit, and it's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1350000, but no more. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
